LanguageData.Cleaning.description: Cleaners clear snow and clean in the home area.
LanguageData.Hauling.description: Haulers carry things to where they need to be.
LanguageData.Crafting.description: Crafters do general low-skilled labor at work stations. This includes stonecutting, smelting, and more.
LanguageData.Art.description: Artists create beautiful works of art.
LanguageData.Tailoring.description: Tillater kolonister å bygge en skredderbenk, og lage nytt tøy av stoff, lær eller andre materialer.
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Smiths create weapons and tools from rough materials.
LanguageData.PlantCutting.description: Plant cutters remove and harvest the wild plants you've designated.
LanguageData.Mining.description: Miners dig out squares that you have designated for mining. If these are mineral squares, they will yield usable minerals.
LanguageData.Growing.description: Growers plant seeds and harvest grown crops.
LanguageData.Repair.description: Repairers fix broken-down buildings and equipment.
LanguageData.Construction.description: Constructors build things that you've designated.
LanguageData.Hunting.description: Hunters kill animals which are designated to be hunted.
LanguageData.Cooking.description: Cooks prepare meals and butcher meat.
LanguageData.Handling.description: Animal handlers tame, care for, harvest resources from and slaughter animals.
LanguageData.Warden.description: Wardens manage, feed, chat with, and recruit prisoners.
LanguageData.Flicker.description: Flickers flick switches. For example, when you designate toggling power on a turret, a flicker must manually flick it to toggle the power.
LanguageData.Patient.description: Patients rest in medical beds if they need to receive treatment or recover from illness.
LanguageData.Doctor.description: Doctors bring food and treat those lying incapacitated in bed. They will care for both colonists and prisoners.
LanguageData.Firefighter.description: Firefighters extinguish fires in the colony.
